channel.title: CVE Feed for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6879, MT6895, MT6983, MT8781
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6879, MT6895, MT6983, MT8781

item.title: CVE-2023-20686|2024-08-02T09:14:40.217Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6879%2C%20mt6895%2C%20mt6983%2C%20mt8781
item.description: In display drm, there is a possible double free due to a race condition. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07570826; Issue ID: ALPS07570826.

item.description: In display drm, there is a possible double free due to a race condition. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07570772; Issue ID: ALPS07570772.
